text: Disgustingly filthy. Every table was dirty. I saw one food preparer sneeze into her hand, then continued to prepare food without washing her hands.
Two days ago you forgot the egg in my sausage and egg mc muffin, today no maple syrup with my hot cakes. This is why you're not worth 15.00 an hour.

Ran through the drive thru today on the way to work for the much advertised "Egg White Delight McMuffin".  250 calories & 7 grams of fat! (versus the regular Egg McMuffin-300 calories and 12 grams of fat)  Oh hells yes!   I am a HUGE fan of the Egg McMuffin and was excited to try this one.  If only McDonalds would serve these breakfast sandwiches all the time and not just the morning my whole darn world would be brighter!  Sigh!  I think I need to start a petition!

Anyways, back to my sandwich.  The egg was fluffy, light and airy.  Totally not what I expected but hugely amazed at how good it was.  It wasn't dry like I had thought it would be.  The cheese was a white cheese versus the American cheese on the Egg McMuffin.  I didn't notice much different.  Overall the Egg White Delight is probably better than the Egg McMuffin.  Ooops shhhhh did I just say that?  

The service was alright.  Nothing too crazy but it WAS in the drive thru.  As long as everything comes out as ordered all is good right?  My only complaint which is always my complaint with Micky D's is they never put very much ice in their drinks.  Why is that?  SMH

Only 2 stars because of the wait!  I went inside and ended up waiting 20 fucking minutes for my order. ..insane! All the manager said was "sorry " half ass as she turned around.  Cars in the drive thru were just  zooming through.  They need to get their act together

Got a coupon for  a free mcflurry and wanted to treat my niece. Get there. Wait in line. AND THEY SAY THEY DONT HAVE ICE CREAM!?!?!? What??? 
McDonald's get your shit together.

This particular location has a lot of problems getting your order right. I know running a drive thru is really complicated, but does anyone teach their employees to check the bag before serving the customers? Even complaints to management do not improve things. Also, be careful if your order is for more than one person per car. Then they really get confused here!

Just went thru the drive through. Whoever was taking my order was making jokes. Saying all the foods wrong. It was confusing. Then when I pulled up the window for my food 2 employers were texting. Looked up at me. Then continued to text. I don't care if it's mcdonalds, that's very unprofessional and rude. Put your phone away you are working.
Alway have great service. My daughter left her purse there 3 days ago and they still had it. Thank you to all the employees for being honest.
Couldn't be more difficult to work at a McDonalds I guess ... they made me wait 10 minutes in the "reserved" parking spot and forgot my sauce and my nuggets were cold ....

I hadn't eaten anything at  McDonald's other than the desserts in years. Finally after getting a buy one get one free on the new fresh never-frozen quarter-pounder I thought I'd try it out with my son. To my surprise it was actually really good! The frys are still a bit salty, but the burger was great plus the fact that all sized soft drinks here are only $1 makes it even better! So if you haven't had McDonald's in a while come back and try the new fresh Burgers they're good.

I came here a Sunday morning with my kids and was so impressed with the place. The inside was more modern and very clean. It was early so they weren't busy and we got our food promptly and it was accurate. What stood out most to me was a young man, who's name I might be getting wrong here, Chauncey. He was so polite, greeting us on the way in, checking up on us at our table and at the other tables asking if everything was good and if we needed something. That has never happened to me at a McDonalds before. He kept busy, sweeping the floors and wiping down tables. I was just so impressed with his courteous, hard work. I forgot to mention that I had gone up to order another round of pancakes for the bottomless pit that is my son. They're weren't busy so they delivered the food to us instead of just calling out our number.
Did I mention I was impressed?

Over the past few months, my consumption of McDonald's food has markedly increased, thanks to an increase in my cycling mileage.  I mean, really, when else is it acceptable, nay, even expected, to replenish lost salts and calories via Mickey D's?  Thus, my feelings towards McD's may be skewed to be more positive than most yelpers.  When I dropped into this McDonald's for a quick lunch break during a bike ride, I was famished and heartily devoured a hot cheeseburger and fresh fries in approximately 2 seconds.  After inhaling my lunch, I noticed that the place was clean and, after a quick visit to the loo, the restroom was clean as well.  Staff seemed pleasant enough and got both my husband's order and mine correct (although that should really be a given).  McD's is what it is and I'm always glad to see the golden arches when I'm riding my bicycle!

I typically don't do reviews for fast food restaurants because I assume for them to be hit or miss. When it becomes more misses than hits there is a problem. I've had issues like getting mcChicken patties when I order a cheese burger or forgetting sauces or something through the drive through. This time they had no CO2 for their soda machine. They did not tell anyone upfront to be proactive and said if you don't want Powerade or water I can give you your money back. I've worked at fast food before and if you don't have something, you borrow it! If you can't borrow then you pay someone to give your refreshments back.

Use to be good. Now when I order drive thru there is an awkward pause after every item and a "is that it?". No that's not it, a grown man isn't eating a happy meal so get me a mighty kids meal! If you get the "is that it?" person check your order because mine was wrong.

Went here to get a quarter pounder and a Coke. They had two drive through lanes and I picked one. Shortly thereafter someone pulled up into the second one and placed their order and drove through. WTF? I was there first. I was ignored until I yelled into the speaker that I would like to place an order. Employee taking the order couldn't get it through her head that I didn't want fries. I only wanted quarter pounder and a Coke. She really did find it difficult to comprehend. After paying for my order I went to the second window and was told to drive to the waiting area for the quarter pounder. Kind of weird this McDonald's has a dedicated waiting area. Defeats the purpose of a drive-through. After a few minutes an employee came out and delivered to me a quarter pound or with way too much to ketchup. Are usually would give McDonald's a break but there is nothing about this experience that was good.

I don't come here very often but when I do I always go inside to order because the drive thru isn't always the most efficient. When I order I always ask for something to be added or removed so that I know that it is fresh. I usually have my order to eat there so that if there is any issue I can get it fixed. Since the remodel it gets busy here during lunch hour as I believe the kids from the high school come for lunch break. Not a place I go to on the weekend as it gets kinda crazy.
100% the worst location. It's filthy. Slowest service ever,all on more than one occasion. Trash overflowing.

I've been going here for several years now. The quality has gone down alot over the times. Waited over 20 minutes for my food from the drive-thru. Went in to see what happened and they had forgot about the order and left it sitting there. Just not the best Mcdonalds around

I'm very surprised this McDonald's has such a poor review. I always come to this one after midnight so maybe that's why my food is always amazing. In fact, this one is better than the one by Albertsons on Durango. I love this one. They're nice and the food is great!

No parking anymore. I try to go there to eat and search and search for parking. Finally I park super far away at the veterinary clinic and then walk in only to find their lobby is closed. 10 pm on a Friday night in Vegas is way too early to close the lobby. Not coming back to what used to be my favorite burger place

Swung by here on my way back to work. I wanted something fast and easy and fast is what I got. By the time I got to the second window my food was there. I got a double bacons cheeseburger which was pretty tasty and some french fries. The only down fall was that my food wasn't as hot as I would of liked. I think it was sitting under a heat lamp for some time.

I come here a few times a week as I work in the area and their customer service is so awesome. Every person that works here is so friendly and accommodating. The manager there, I believe his name is Chauncey, has the BEST attitude and brightens my morning every time he takes my order. He greets me by name and is honestly just a ray of sunshine. He takes such pride in his job and it definitely shows in his strong work ethic and happy demeanor. His positivity also reflects in his team. This is without a doubt the best McDonald's in Las Vegas! Thank you guys for all you do!
Fries were super salty and the employees were spending a lot of time standing around. Service was prompt, pleasant experience other than the super salted fries

Horrible customer service! I was there today at 9:50. My son and I had been running errands all morning and he wanted French fries. I'm so sorry, I did not know that fries were not sold at 9:50 in the morning. I "guess" I just wasn't thinking! I asked the girl at the window for fries and she RUDELY! replied "we're only serving breakfast!" Okay, I'm so sorry! So you have to be mean! Get another job if you can't be nice! I'm sure you don't care and "whatever" right? Well maybe someone reading this will take it for what's its worth. You have an employee that needs an attitude adjustment!

We went to the drive thru and asked if they had ice cream that day (which they typically don't have), and they said yes. So we ordered a caramel sundae, and my response was "Oh sorry, we ran out of caramel 2 hours ago", never fails with McDonald's. I am a bit furious.

I NEVER eat McDonalds but on this one occasion I decided to stop and get an OJ and hash brown (9:00am).... I have never been treated better through a drive thru than I have this morning! The entire staff from the one taking my order to getting my order!! 4 stars cause let's face it, it's still McDonalds!!

If I could give them a half a star I would. I work late and stop here a few times. Never greeted, the guy at the second window is never in uniform, doesn't greet you, looks at you like you are inconveniencing him and very rude. Last night I had a $30 order and they gave me the sauce. He argued with me and then told me to give him the bag back and slammed the sauces out of the bag. Get home and the sauces were spoiled. Fries were oily and soggy and sandwiches were thrown together. This place is just terrible. Should rename it from McDonald's to McCrappy's!!!! Very dissatisfied with them and will not be returning.
Awesome McDonalds with a complete new design. Our dealership eats here every day with fast and courteous service.

Never coming to this place again. After showing up and being the first in line, the cashier took the order of the person behind us, then proceeded to finish the orders of four other people who ordered after us (we ordered two twenty piece nuggets, two lrg drinks and a large fry). Waited almost half an hour for our food. Did not receive our drink cups and were given the wrong sauces. 

Customer service was severely lacking as the cashier was extremely rude and let five patrons sit there for ten mins without being acknowledged.
No manners. Would have been a better experience had the person taking our drive thru order simply said "thank you" or used common courtesy when speaking to a customer.

I am giving this place 1 star for a very good reason.  I've been to this place twice now approx 2-3 weeks apart, on my way to work very early in the morning. Once inside, and once in the drive thru.  I think I had the same person take my order both times.  Well BOTH times my order was messed up.  How do you screw up breakfast?????

First time I was there I told him I wanted the new egg white mcmuffin with the white cheese ( I even POINTED to the huge pictures they have displayed on the wall)  and i want sausage.  When I opened it up, there was american cheese on it.  

When I went the 2nd time in the drive thru, I ordered a sausage egg biscuit and a sausage egg white muffin with the white cheese, and a hashbrown. I had a buy one get one coupon and my total was only $2.40 I knew right then he messed it up.  Sure enough, I pay and open my bag and there was canadian bacon on my sandwich instead of sausage and no egg on my sausage egg biscuit.  

Both times I was the only person there. I'd hate to see what kind of mistakes they make when their busy.  

GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER!!!! Making a breakfast sandwich isn't rocket science. !!!!

I usually don't expect much from a fast food restaurant, so it is rare for me to write a review on one.  The piss poor service at this one rates a piss poor review.  Went through the drive-thru and the attendant got my order wrong...I then had to pull through and wait for my order to be ready.  The worker then brought my order out without drinks and told me he would bring them out.  10 min later I ended up going in to get my drinks and the workers were standing around and acted like they were doing me a favor by completing the order I already paid for.  The manager was standing behind the workers and ignored me.  I asked to speak with the manager and she spoke up, identified herself, and told me that I ordered wrong so that's why I didn't get my drinks...wrong value meals come with drinks.  Piss poor service, ignorant manager,..never coming to this location again.

I ordered one item a large coffee and it took 15 minutes for them to bring the coffee. In addition the young lady that brought the coffee had a bad attitude!! I never had this experience before at any McDonalds ??

Disappointed in this location. The one up the street on Durango and Farm is far superior. Had to wait out front for my meal and my filet o fish was clearly old and not fresh. Bun stiff, not enough tartar sauce, fish patty too crispy-seemed old. Just bad.

Usually McDonald's fries are really good but this time the manager rushed them & they were undercooked. We can't even eat them or we'd get sick. The manager was also very rude. Wasted money for sure. Won't be getting anything from here again. Also, the McDonald's wasn't able to make any food but fries & we were the only ones ordering at the moment.
Different person working today. Still couldn't get the order right. STILL sucks. Still.
